sub_title: Head Tutor | Film, Media, and Rhetoric  | Environmental Humanities | Public Liberal Arts
summary: Chad Weidner holds a PhD in literature, and teaches Liberal Arts at University College Roosevelt. Books: Fractured Ecologies, The Green Ghost: William Burroughs and the Ecological Mind. Co-founder of the European Beat Studies Network.
treasury_media: [{'url': None, 'title': 'Cultures, Citizenship and Human Rights | Utrecht University', 'description': "The research focus area Cultures, Citizenship and Human Rights analyses the convergence and tensions between the cultural and legal foundations of European citizenship.
